plot outline: Kalleshi is a contractor and a political henchman. He has aspirations of enjoying political power. A situation leads him to climb the political ladder with the help of his illiterate wife Ramakka. But does using his righteous wife backfire on his plans?
title: Hebbet Ramakka
plot: Ramakka an illiterate is forced to take part in the district council election from a constituency which is reserved for women.

Kalleshi is a contractor and a political henchman. He has aspirations of enjoying political power. A situation leads him to climb the political ladder with the help of his illiterate wife Ramakka. But does using his righteous wife backfire on his plans?::Sunayana Suresh
